titles.title: Protect Minors from Medical Malpractice Act of 2025
Protect Minors from Medical Malpractice Act of 2025
To protect children from medical malpractice in the form of gender transition procedures.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, Education and Workforce, Natural Resources, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
